DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine inclusion 1.5 ounce pumpkin seed per day diet woman alter dietary fatty acid intake blood pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Pumpkin Seeds Dietary Fatty Acid Intake Blood Pressure Women
DOC.detailed_description: Cardiovascular disease number one cause morbidity mortality United States . Diets high polyunsaturated monounsaturated fatty acid show decrease risk cardiovascular disease . Pumpkin seed good source monounsaturated polyunsaturated fatty acid . Oil extract pumpkin seed show low blood pressure . One purpose study determine whether eat 1.5 ounce pumpkin seed per day improve polyunsaturated monounsaturated fatty acid intake diet healthy adult woman . Another purpose study determine whether eat 1.5 ounce pumpkin seed day low blood pressure .
DOC.criteria: Female Over age 18 Able read , write , speak English Able keep threeday diet diary Willing able consume pumpkin seed Pregnant plan become pregnant Allergic pumpkin seed High blood pressure Regularly consume pumpkin seed ( 4 time per month ) Taking blood pressure medication Liver disease Kidney disease Gastrointestinal disease History bariatric surgery History major cardiovascular event Heart disease Currently undergo cancer treatment ( except nonmelanoma cancer ) Following weight control diet Following disease specific diet Following vegan diet Have diagnose eating disorder
